title: Dhrugtest
author: Dhrugtest
content: We've been into this crash down since last year October till up to date is there still believe that BTC will come back to it's stand because this getting worst day by day üòï I Pray it should put a smile on us before the year runs out üôè

comments.author: mich
comments.body: It‚Äôs hard to tell how long and bad this correction will be. Personally, I didn‚Äôt think bitcoin would go below 30K during this recession. Clearly I was wrong but now my assumption is that it‚Äôs highly unlikely it will go below 20K. In my opinion, bitcoin is not going anywhere and it‚Äôs only a matter of time until it‚Äôs back at new historic all time highs. When you‚Äôve seen enough of these corrections over the years, you‚Äôre not as affected emotionally and can stay rational. At the end of the day I‚Äôm still bullish on bitcoin. I'm still a long hold on BTC and until the economy levels out and the war in Ukraine is resolved it‚Äôs difficult to say when we‚Äôll see Crpto making big gains.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Depends on those strong enough to provide support. Currently there is no one strong enough except one or very few who can do it unconventionally.. There is a unique whale who is poor both very wealthy
